The familiar city of #NanjingMassacre was also a walled. 
And the fall of the walled city means "killing all the inhabitants" in 🇨🇳 since ancient times.
cause of such customs , 🇨🇳 people use the phrase ｍassacre. Of course, there is no custom in 🇯🇵 to kill all non-resisting ple.

There are those who deny it happened. 

Others, even here, avoid it because the victims–then our friends, are now our 'enemies'.

We will not forget. 🕯️ 
#NanjingMassacre

1470371056753934341.full_text: 香港一小学为小一生播放南京大屠杀片段, 小学生恐慌嚎哭 家长表示不满 https://t.co/8lI3RaF8br

title.string_value: 香港一小学为小一生播放南京大屠杀片段, 小学生恐慌嚎哭 家长表示不满

description.string_value: 香港教育局为“培养学童认识国情”，今年八月建议全港学校举办悼念南京大屠杀活动。有自媒体近日揭发，有小学对一年级学生播放历史短片，显示日军处决百姓、婴幼儿尸体遍地的片段，导致部份学生恐慌嚎哭。教育局回覆港媒说，历史就是历史，不能回避。
